name: structured-partners-landing
description: AbstractVC-style, ultra-minimal M&A landing page for Structured Partners (industrial & field services focused), built with Next.js 14 (app router) and Tailwind CSS, ready for Vercel deploy.

tasks.description: Implement an Abstract VC-style single-page landing site for Structured Partners with MD-only positioning and industrial & field services focus. No blog, no CMS, no auth. Just a hero and a refined footer.

requirements: Use Tailwind CSS for styling; no component libraries, no shadcn for this first pass.
Implement a single route `/` that renders the Structured Partners landing page.
Layout and vibe should follow the Abstract VC homepage but adapted to Structured Partners content and brand.
Typography and spacing should feel high-end: lots of negative space, small caps for labels, no loud buttons.
Site must be responsive and look excellent on desktop and modern mobile.
Keep bundle small and avoid unnecessary dependencies.
